title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: When modifying the default value of a list box in a report parameter, the previously set default value is lost.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter configuration
2. Select a list box type
3. Set a default value
4. Modify the default value

Expected behavior: The originally set default value should be retained after modifying it.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The originally set default value should be retained after modifying it.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter configuration
2. Select a list box type
3. Set a default value
4. Modify the default value
